navigation

Class OdometryCorrection

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • navigation.OdometryCorrection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class OdometryCorrection
extends java.lang.Thread
    The OdometryCorrection class corrects the odometry whenever one of the two color sensors of the robot crosses a grid line. It has a private method which determines which grid line is closest to a given coordinate. An instance of this class holds an instance of the OdometryPoseProvider class which it updates when a grid line is crossed.
    Author:
    Scott Cooper
    See Also:
    OdometeryPoseProvider

    • Constructor Detail

      • OdometryCorrection

        public OdometryCorrection(OdometryPoseProvider odometer,
                          ColorSensor leftCS,
                          ColorSensor rightCS)
        The constructor of the OdometryCorrection initializes instances of the class OdometeryPoseProvider.
        Parameters:
        odometer - The OdometeryPoseProvider that is used for the robot
        leftCS - The left ColorSensor that is used to check grid lines
        rightCS - The right ColorSensorthat is used to check grid lines

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        If the boolean isTurning from the Navigation is false, check if either of the two ColorSensors crosses a grid line. If one does, determine which grid line is closest and update the Odometer accordingly.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread

      • enable

        public static void enable()
        Enable OdometryCorrection globally

      • disable

        public static void disable()
        Disable OdometeryCorrection globally

      • lastHeadingCorrection

        public static double lastHeadingCorrection()
        Get the amount the heading was off the last time a line was crossed. Following a call to this method, the last heading is set to 0 to prevent subsequent corrections if a line is missed.
        Returns:
        The amount the heading needs to be corrected

      • lastDistanceCorrection

        public static double lastDistanceCorrection()
        Get the amount the distance was off the last time a line was crossed. Following a call to this method, the last distance correction is set to 0 to prevent subsequent corrections if a line is missed.
        Returns:
        The amount the distance needs to be corrected
